description:
We are adding to our already awesome team here at South Bay Mazda! We are seeking individuals with a proven background in BDC. EXPERIENCE IS REQUIRED.

  • 1000 leads a month
  • More 250 leads per manager
  • Full Time position
  • Hourly + Bonuses and Benefits
  • MUST HAVE EXCELLENT VERBAL AND COMMUNICATION SKILLS
  • MUST BE COMPUTER LITERATE
  • MUST BE TRAINABLE

Come join our team.

We are in search of highly motivated BDC professionals. MUST HAVE EXPERIENCE. This is a full time position. Great compensation program with medical benefits. We have a great product and we believe you will think to also.

SERIOUS CANDIDATES ONLY. POSITION AVAILABLE IMMEDIATELY. I HIRE ON THE SPOT. BE READY TO IMPRESS ME.
